answers.answer: Unless you have a preexisting condition that prevents vaginal delivery or you have complications during labor your chances of having a c section are low. I had a c section because of preeclampsia and failed induction. They had me try to push before the c section and my son was stuck in the birth canal.

They really can't make that call until your in labor depending on how things go. If things go smooth then you can do vaginal but things like a breech baby, high blood pressure, fetal heartrate are all monitered and will determine vaginal or csection

question: How soon can your doc tell u if your having a c section or natural? Im 27 weeks and praying to deliver vaginal
title: c section or natural?
